Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I know its early, but EVE no longer works for me after the update. Is that the same for others?

Anyone know if there will be an update or is there another option?

Keith

There's no reason to expect a mod to work after an update without the mod maker specifically saying it will.

If you're playing 1.4, you should probably play stock until the mods have had a chance to update - if they will be updating.  I've seen it mentioned that a lot of mods will still work, but given how much EVE does, I'm not surprised at all that it's broken in 1.4.

Follow the EVE Add-on release thread itself, and watch for the updates.  Mod makers can't do anything until after the update is released.
Due to the UnityEngine update, every mod that includes custom shaders most probably will not work. These shaders will probably have to be re-exported using the newer version.
